titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing a public ceremony on the West Lawn of the Capitol in honor of the Bicentennial of the United States Constitution.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.
Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Public Works and Transportation. Report No: 100-270.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/15/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Commission on the Bicentennial of the United States Constitution to conduct a ceremony on the West Terraces and Lawns of the United States Capitol entitled "Celebration of Citizenship" on September 16, 1987. Authorizes the Commission to erect upon the Capitol grounds such structures and equipment as necessary.
